ThingDef.Name: BDP_PlasmaLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona lizion plasma machinegun
ThingDef.description: MG38A general purpose machinegun is a heavy lizion plasma accelerator developed by Pan-Humanoid Republic Arsenals. Gulping lizion gas cells and inaccurately spray out energized plasma, this machinegun will suppress anyone within its limited range until the cells run dry.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: BDP_PlasmaFlameThrower_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona lizion plasmathrower
ThingDef.description:
Designed to spray out a continuous stream of energized plasma, unleashing a lizionic inferno onto enemies and probably friendlies, the F58A2 sustained plasma emitter is uncapable of using standarized lizion cells. Instead it requires a specialized lizion gas tank backpack to operate.

While republic military doctorine explictly banned such usage, it's said that by turning off the lizion energizer, this weapon can be modified to unleash a jet of near absolute zero, unflammable lizion gas, capable of acting as a fire extinguisher. However it is useless against self-combusting materials like prometheum.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
